title: Large Language Models in Information Retrieval
description: Using LLMs in a modular end-to-end Information Retrieval pipeline (rewrite → retrieve → rerank → evaluate) to improve retrieval performance (nDCG@K, MRR@K, Recall@K, P@K).

title: Dastgyr.com
description: Dastgyr is a large-scale B2B e-commerce platform connecting buyers and sellers across emerging markets. My role as a Software Engineer was to build new features and services from scratch that to solve complex real time problems that impacted thousands of users. I led the migration of core services to a modern microservice architecture, introduced a reward and incentive system that boosted engagement, and improved how sellers and buyers interact with the platform. Along the way, I built scalable services using NestJS, TypeScript, Kafka, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB to power a seamless and high performance marketplace experience.

title: Kisaan
description: Kisaan helps uplift rural communities by building digital solutions that improve agriculture, supply chains, and financial inclusion. As a Senior Software Engineer, I worked on building scalable backend services and modernizing core systems that power features like new user onboarding and order processing. I focused heavily on observability and monitoring, integrating OpenTelemetry and Sentry to collect rich metrics, track application health, and resolve issues faster improving reliability and developer productivity. I also automated development workflows with ESLint, Prettier, and Husky to enforce code quality and streamline deployment processes.

title: GrocerApp
description: GrocerApp is a local e-commerce platform, making grocery shopping simple and seamless. At GrocerApp, I helped improve the platform’s customer support experience by integrating automation tools like Zendesk, cutting live chat resolution time by 80%. I also built features that enhanced customer engagement and retention, including personalized order recommendations and gamification-driven loyalty elements. My work focused on delivering a smoother, more responsive user experience while scaling the platform’s backend with Node.js and React.
